p: Chewable gel tablets’ firmness and springiness were measured by texture analyzer TA.XT.plus (Texture Technologies, Brewster, NY, USA). The “Gummy confectionery” test was chosen. Parameters of the test: return speed 10 mm/s; force 1 g; strain 50%; pre-test 1.00 mm/s test speed 1.00 mm/s; post-test speed 10 mm/s; hold time 60 s; and trigger force 5.0 g. Changes of texture of the chewable gel tablets were analyzed after one day and one month for the OR series gel tablets.
